attribute.name.extraspellattributes.aure: Damage Absorbed by Armor Recouped as Reabsorption
attribute.name.extraspellattributes.conv: Arcane Power Attribute gained as Attack Damage
Fire Power Attribute gained as Attack Damage
Frost Power Attribute gained as Attack Damage
Attack Damage gained as Arcane Power
Attack Damage gained as Fire Power
Attack Damage gained as Frost Power
Attack Damage gained as Healing Power
attribute.name.extraspellattributes.diss: Dissolution Gained Per Damage Taken, for 4 seconds. You are at Maximum Health while in Dissolution.
attribute.name.extraspellattributes.glan: Chance for a hit received to be a Glancing Blow, being Mitigated by 35%
attribute.name.extraspellattributes.inev: Inevitability gained per second. +10% Spell Crit Damage per Inevitability, up to +100%.
attribute.name.extraspellattributes.sere: Chance for Suppressed Received Spells to Instead Deal No Damage (Max 75%)
attribute.name.extraspellattributes.spel: Chance for Spells Received to be Suppressed, dealing 50% Less Damage
desc.extraspellattributes.acro: Your % Spellbreak is the chance that a suppressed spell instead deals no damage. Spellbreak caps at 75%.
desc.extraspellattributes.defi: Your Defiance subtracts its total from the total damage you take. Defiance has diminishing returns.
desc.extraspellattributes.determination: Your % Determination is the proportion of health lost that regenerates back over the next four seconds.
desc.extraspellattributes.glance: A Glancing Blow deals only 65% damage. You cannot receive Glancing Blows from damage that doesn't come from an entity (Such as Fire and Poison).
desc.extraspellattributes.reabsorption: You regenerate Absorption (Yellow Hearts) up to your maximum Reabsorption gradually after not being hit for 4 seconds.
desc.extraspellattributes.supp: A Suppressed Spell deals only 50% damage.
enchantment.extraspellattributes.aureate: Some damage absorbed by armor is regenerated as yellow hearts, up to maximum reabsorption. Gives some reabsorption. Stacks.
enchantment.extraspellattributes.battler: Some incoming damage is regenerated over the next four seconds. Stacks.
enchantment.extraspellattributes.defianc: Mitigates a flat amount of damage; this enchantment stacks with diminishing returns.
enchantment.extraspellattributes.dissolu: You gain Dissolution equal to the damage you take, lowering your Maximum Health until you take no damage for 4 seconds. You are always at maximum health while in Dissolution.
enchantment.extraspellattributes.endurin: Reduces damage taken past your Endurance Threshold. Stacks. Minimum Endurance Threshold is 20% of your Maximum Life.
enchantment.extraspellattributes.etherea: You lose 95% of your health, but gain +5 and +100% Reabsorption.
enchantment.extraspellattributes.fortifi: Increases the threshold at which your Endurance reduces damage taken an amount equal to total enchantment level. Stacks. Minimum Endurance Damage Reduction is 25%.
enchantment.extraspellattributes.glancin: Chance for hits taken to be Glancing Blows, dealing only 65% normal damage. Glancing Blows can't come from non-entities. Stacks.
enchantment.extraspellattributes.spellbr: Chance to Avoid Suppressed spells, maximum 75% chance. Stacks.
enchantment.extraspellattributes.suppres: Chance to Suppress Magic Damage, halving the damage taken. Stacks.
enchantment.extraspellattributes.warding: Gives Reabsorption: recharging yellow hearts. Stacks.
